allow:
Bash(TIME_IN_FORCE=GTC python3 -c "
from app.config import config
print(''Order Configuration with GTC:'')
print(f''  Order Type: {config.order.order_type}'')
print(f''  Time in Force: {config.order.time_in_force}'')
print(f''  Extended Hours: {config.order.extended_hours_enabled}'')
")

Bash(EXTENDED_HOURS_ENABLED=true python3 -c "
from app.config import config
print(''Order Configuration with Extended Hours:'')
print(f''  Order Type: {config.order.order_type}'')
print(f''  Time in Force: {config.order.time_in_force}'')
print(f''  Extended Hours: {config.order.extended_hours_enabled}'')
")
